Welcome to my portfolio.

About me

My pronouns are he/him. I was born in Chicago on November 23rd, 2005, I am currently a college junior.

My career goals are constantly shifting. Back in my freshman year of college I created Evergarden, an art marketplace, with aspiring artists in mind. I saw artists on TikTok, Instagram, and Twitter (X?) who had masterpieces on hand and I wanted to create a centralized location for people to discover these artists and their works of art.

My end goal was a thriving online community of respected artists and loyal clientele; I wanted these artists to play a part in the design of the website as well. For example, a community voted artist spotlight where one artist is voted to be front and center on the homepage. Currently, I am interested in logistics & transportation.

You can view my top 5 results from the Clifton Strenghts Assessment below. My top 2 are Restorative & Relator. I feel those are very accurate to my character. Those labeled "restorative" are stated to be adept at dealing with problems, and I pride myself on my problem-solving abilities. The assessment claims that people with the "relator" strength enjoy close relationships with others & find deep satisfaction in working hard with friends to achieve a goal. This captures me as a person greatly, I definetely prefer to work with people I am close with, and I deeply prefer a smaller friend group with close connections.
